characters.name: Hyung-Suk Park
characters.description:
__Height:__ 150 cm (4’11”) (Old Body), 178.5 cm (5’10”½) (New Body)
__Relatives:__ His mother, David, Dylan, and Sarah (cousins)

Hyung-Suk is a student in the fashion department of J High School. He has a unique ability in which he can transfer his consciousness in and out at will between two completely different bodies. He is a very kind and friendly person at heart, preferring to avoid unnecessary conflicts if he can, but will help those in need even in dangerous situations.

(Source: Lookism Wikia)

characters.name: Jae-Yeol Hong
characters.description:
__Height:__ 172 cm (5’7”)
__Relatives:__ Steve Hong (father), Joy Hong (sister), Kitae Hong (brother)

Jae-Yeol is a student in the fashion department at Jae Won High School. He is an extremely quiet person who does not speak a word to anyone but is shown to be a strong fighter with a good sense of justice.

(Source: Lookism Wikia)

characters.name: Eun-Tae Lee
characters.description:
__Height:__ 174 cm (5’9”)

He is a student in the architecture department at J High School and the leader of the Burn Knuckles.

characters.name: Soo-Jung Choi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 145 cm (4’9”), 158 cm (5’2”) (new body)
__Relatives:__ Charles Choi (father)

~! She is currently a student in J High School. Like Daniel, she also has two bodies. !~

characters.name: Ha-Neul Park
characters.description:
__Height:__ 158 cm (5'2")

Ha-Neul is a student in the fashion department of J High School. Right from the beginning of the story, Ha-Neul is known to be a flirt; having immediately attempted to flirt with Hyung-Suk upon seeing him. Her classmates claim that she does this every time she sees someone good-looking.

(Source: Lookism Wikia)

characters.name: Mi-Jin Kim
characters.description: She is a student in the fashion department of Jae Won High School, as well as Zack Lee's love interest and one of Daniel's friends.

characters.name: Jin-Sung Lee
characters.description:
__Height:__ 185 cm (6'1")
__Love Interest:__ Mi-Jin

Jin-Sung is a student in the fashion department of J High School, as well as Mi-Jin's love interest. Even prior to meeting Hyung-Suk, Jin-Sung was kind at heart despite his poor manners and extremely high imprudence.

characters.name: Yo-Han Seong
characters.description: He was a childhood friend of Mira and Zack, as well as the leader of God Dog.

characters.name: Bum-Jae Park
characters.description: He is a student in the architecture department at Jae Won high school and Vice-leader of Burn Knuckle.

characters.name: Se-Rim Park
characters.description:
She is the leader of Hostel B and Warren Chae's best friend.

(Source: Lookism Wikia)

characters.name: Hyun Jang
characters.description: He is a student in the beauty department of J High School.

characters.name: Won-Seok Chae
characters.description:
He is one of the few members left in Hostel B and Sally Park's best friend.

(Source: Lookism Wikia)

characters.name: Chun Wang
characters.description:
__Height:__ 182 cm (6’)

Olly Wang used to go to the same cram school as Sally Park and Heather. He was a smart kid whose immigrant parents pushed him to extreme lengths to be a good student. His parents were so overbearing that he felt like he was driven to insanity. 

Olly became obsessed with Eli Jang after witnessing him destroy Backdoor. He did anything to get Eli's attention, stealing from minors and even robbing his own house. When Gun decided to destroy Hostel, Olly advocated for them and Gun decided to let them go, on the condition that Hostel becomes one of the four crews.
His reckless behavior and choices can be attributed to the fact that he cannot feel pain or emotions. This inability to feel anything also contributes to his obsession with Eli Jang because he believes that Eli is the only one who has made him feel anything previously, ~!but this is later revealed to be false, and his guilt over his involvement in Heather's death is really what caused the feelings!~
